item.title: Anthropic's AI Agent Just Crashed Indian IT Stocks 6%: What Cowork Can Do, What It Can't & Why TCS, Infosys Are Panicking
item.description: Nifty IT crashed 6% today - worst fall since March 2020. TCS, Infosys, Wipro down 5-8%. Here's what Anthropic's Cowork AI agent actually does, why Indian IT companies are worried, and whether your job is safe.
